example.description: Creates a new Auto Scaling group with the specified name and other attributes.

example.code: New-ASAutoScalingGroup -AutoScalingGroupName my-test-asg -LaunchConfigurationName my-launch-cfg -MinSize 2 -MaxSize 4 -AvailabilityZone @("us-west-2a", "us-west-2b") -Tag @( @{ Name="Key"; Value="singleValueKey" }, @{ Name="Key"; Value=@("multiValue1", "multiValue2") })
example.description: Creates a new Auto Scaling group with the specified name and other attributes.
